description: You’ll love how quick and tasty this mixed berry smoothie recipe is. Plus, you can customise it with whichever berries you love.
keywords: Smoothie & frappé,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Mother's Day,Banana,Halal,High fibre,High protein,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Low fat,Peanut free
name: 5-Minute Berry Smoothies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place yoghurt, coconut water, rolled oats, mixed berries and banana into a large blender or food processor. Blend until a smooth mixture forms. Pour into four tall glasses and serve immediately.
